participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and overwhelmed, he often feels trapped in his current situation but hopes for a better future.
participant_1.background: i hate my job. i'm planning on getting a divorce. my wife spends all my money. i work as a car salesman.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, she finds joy in simple pleasures and values her hobbies deeply.
participant_2.background: knitting is my passion. i am scared of dying. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i love to bake cookies.
